description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useLocalStorage' that synchronizes a component state with localStorage, including error handling for JSON parsing/serialization and SSR/private browsing support. It ensures session persistence across page refreshes, intended for use in a web application requiring session state management.

methods.name: safeParse(value, fallback)
methods.description: Parses a JSON string safely, returning a fallback on failure or null input.

methods.name: safeStringify(value)
methods.description: Serializes a value to JSON string safely, returning undefined if serialization fails.

methods.name: getStorage()
methods.description: Retrieves the window.localStorage object if available, with guards for SSR and privacy modes.

methods.name: useLocalStorage(key, initialValue)
methods.description: React hook to persist a state value in localStorage with error handling and SSR considerations. Returns the current value, a setter function, and a clear function.
